title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 366.9 - Case management
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 366.9 - Case management

State Regulations
CAP districts must operate a case management system, directly or through a service provider, which will assist CAP participants to
achieve economic and social self-sufficiency. The case management system must
follow one or a combination of the following case management processes: single
case manager, sequential case management or team case management. The CAP
management process must include an ongoing cycle of assessment, planning, linking and monitoring to support the goal of self-sufficiency. Each CAP
participant's case management plan must be reviewed, evaluated and renewed
every three months. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18

366.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
